ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The door closed behind Shadow Wing, Lunarpine transformed to wolf mode and ate the back of the spider. He didn t know if it the spider was poisonous, or what

The door closed behind Shadow Wing, Lunarpine transformed to wolf 
mode and ate the back of the spider. He didn't know if it the spider 
was poisonous, or what the venom could do to his biological parts. He 
didn't want to take chances so he avoided eating the front. Now all 
there was was waiting.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She looked at him."I understand." She turned and walked off.  She 
> went to the entrance of the base, transformed into owl mode and 
flew 
> off.  He needed to be with wolves.  She wanted to be with him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > With Shadow Wing stareing in his eyes Lunarpine fealt 
weakened. "I 
> > understand why you wanted to do it Wing, but it still would've 
been 
> > wrong". He stepped back, he needed to be honest with her, he 
> couldn't 
> > do that controlled by her eyes. "I should have been more careful 
> > about what I said, I should've paid more attention to my 
> surroundings 
> > and kept my thoughts to myself."
> > 
> > "You're trying to hard to make me happy, I'm not happy being 
happy, 
> > I'm only content when I'm killing something. The bot spun 
swinging 
> > his hand catching a large spider off it's web. "I'm not unhappy 
> > because there's not any wolves here, It bothers me that I know 
> > they're out there somewhere."
> > 
> > She asked about the fishing trip. "No thanks, Every time I leave 
> the 
> > area it seems like I miss out on all the action." He turned back 
to 
> > face her, "If I was here Ramhorn might not be in there." 
(Pointing 
> > back towards the CR room.
> >
